mapper.select: select pno, pname, mno, pcode, pdno, pinfo_main, pimage_thoumb from tbl_product where ptype = #{ptype} and isdelete = 0
select pno, pname, mno, pcode, pdno, pinfo_main, pimage_thoumb from tbl_product where ptype = #{ptype} and pname like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' and isdelete = 0
select pno, pname, mno, pcode, pdno, pinfo_main, pimage_thoumb from tbl_product where ptype = #{ptype} and mno in (${manuval}) and isdelete = 0
select pno, pname, mno, pcode, pdno, pinfo_main, pimage_thoumb from tbl_product where ptype = #{ptype} and pdno in (${optionval}) and isdelete = 0

select pno, pname, mno, pcode, pprice, pdno, pinfo_main, pimage_thoumb from tbl_product
where rownum < 9 order by (select count(*) from tbl_order) asc
